title: AI-Integrated Language Curriculum Development: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Based on Adaptive Learning Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of language education and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Emphasizing customized instructional design capabilities using AI-based language learning tools in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners cultivate the ability to design learner-tailored content by utilizing at least three AI-based language learning tools.
Learners create a two-week language curriculum development plan based on an adaptive learning framework.
Learners apply five principles necessary for ethically integrating AI into instructional design to practical cases.
Learners develop at least three low-spec AI language learning activities implementable in smartphone environments.
Learners diagnose bias issues that may arise when utilizing educational AI tools and propose improvement strategies.

resources: Low-spec AI language learning tool (chatbot, translator, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
